pages.text: Knives are special weapons. They deal weaker damage to mobs compares to same-tier swords, but they apply a "bleeding" effect to the target. When a mob is bleeding, it loses half a heart of health every two seconds. When a pig is bleeding, you can right-click the pig with an empty bucket to obtain pig blood.

pages.title: Knife
pages.text: The crafting recipe of wooden knife. To craft other kinds of knives, just replace the plank with stone, gold ingot, iron ingot, diamond or netherite ingot.
